column5: Located just minutes from Historic Gruene and New Braunfels. Experience exciting adventures such as a floating the river or a fun filled day at Schlitterbahn Waterpark! Unwind in Historic Gruene with live music, wine tasting, shopping and fine dining. This property is ideal for couples, families, large groups and is pet friendly. Home is sitting on 2 acres of a park like setting. We also have a basketball hoop. There is a fire pit to enjoy roasting marshmallows, hot dogs or whatever you enjoy
column8: Hidden Gem minutes from Gruene and New Braunfels
